anya-e1211n:16: Bho buddhā tumhepi kho maṃ pāletha.
anya-e1211n:27: Buddhassa bhagavato iddhi kiṃ na kare
anya-e1211n:75: Bho guṇavaṃ purisa tvampi dānaṃ dehi
anya-e1211n:76: Bho guṇavanto purisā tumhe dānaṃ detha
anya-e1211n:95: Bho gacchaṃ yaññadatta tvaṃ maṃ pālaya
anya-e1211n:197: Jantumpetaṃ kaṭaṃ kāremi teneva kaṭe vā
anya-e1211n:198: Jantupete kaṭaṃ kārema teneva kaṭe vā
anya-e1211n:201: Jantunā riyena yo koci sukhaṃ pāpuṇati
anya-e1211n:202: Jantūhi ariyehi ye keci sukhaṃ pāpuṇanti
anya-e1211n:215: Bho satthā tvaṃ sadevakaṃ lokaṃ pālaya
anya-e1211n:229: Satthari dhammarāje ko bhattiṃ na ghaṭīyati
anya-e1211n:414: Bho yāgu tvaṃ pana khudaṃ bhana
anya-e1211n:434: Bho mātā tvaṃ pana ciraṃ jīva
anya-e1211n:460: Jambuyā kho pana yo koci jīvati
anya-e1211n:461: Jambūhi kho pana ye keci jīvanti
anya-e1211n:526: Guṇavatā kulamhā na apeti yo koci
anya-e1211n:527: Guṇavantehi kulehi na apenti ye keci
anya-e1211n:536: Bho gacchaṃ guṇavaṃ tvaṃ pana sugatiṃ gacchāhi
anya-e1211n:556: Bho aṭṭhi saṅkhalikaṃ tvaṃ aniccato passa
anya-e1211n:560: Aṭṭhinā kāyena yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ nimmitaṃ
anya-e1211n:561: Aṭṭhīhi kāyehi yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ nimmitaṃ
anya-e1211n:576: Bho daṇḍī tvaṃ pana kammaṃ karohi
anya-e1211n:590: Daṇḍini pana me mano na ramati
anya-e1211n:591: Daṇḍīsu kho pana me manā na ramanti.
anya-e1211n:596: Bho āyu tvaṃ pana jīvitaṃ pālehi
anya-e1211n:610: Āyūmhi kho pana manaṃ patiṭhitaṃ sabbadā
anya-e1211n:611: Āyūsu kho pana manaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ sabbadā.
anya-e1211n:617: Yāni honti tiliṅgāni anukūlāni yāni ca;
anya-e1211n:622: Kānici pana saheva etesaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ idaṃ.
anya-e1211n:628: Bho sabbā bhuta kalyāṇaṃ karohi kusalā sadā;
anya-e1211n:629: Bho sabbe purisā bhaddaṃ karotha kusalaṃ sadā.
anya-e1211n:631: Sabbe bhojāpayī te tu sā nakhīyittha bhojanaṃ.
anya-e1211n:642: Sabbasmiṃ buddhadhamme ca sadā ramati me mano;
anya-e1211n:643: Sabbesu ca vihāresu thūpe kāresi khattiyoti.
anya-e1211n:646: Sabbā alaṅkatā laṅkā therassa viya āsi ca;
anya-e1211n:647: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā gahakūṭaṃ visaṃ khitaṃ.
anya-e1211n:648: Bho sabbe ca paje tvampi dānaṃ dadāhi sabbadā;
anya-e1211n:649: Bho sabbāyo pajā tumhe sīlaṃ rakkhatha sabbadā.
anya-e1211n:651: Sabbāyo diṭṭhiyo hantvā khemaṃ gacchanti paṇḍitā.
anya-e1211n:652: Sabbassā assu kaññāya niccaṃ kammaṃ karīyyate;
anya-e1211n:655: Sabbāhi ca nadīheva khettaṃ vapati kassako.
anya-e1211n:656: Sabbassā assu kaññāya cittaṃ nadeti paṇḍito;
anya-e1211n:658: Sabbassā pana taṇhāya vimuttassa natthi bhayaṃ;
anya-e1211n:661: Sabbāsaṃ pana gaṅgānaṃ mahogho hoti sabbadā.
anya-e1211n:662: Sabbassā neva kaññāya cittaṃ ramati paṇḍito;
anya-e1211n:663: Sabbāsu ceva gaṅgāsu macchā caranti sabbadāti.
anya-e1211n:668: Bho sabbā bhūta kalyāṇaṃ puññaṃ karohi sabbadā;
anya-e1211n:669: Bho sabbānica bhūtāni puññaṃ karotha sabbadā.
anya-e1211n:670: Sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ samādāya pāraṃ tiṇṇosi brāhmaṇo;
anya-e1211n:671: Sabbāni assu puññāni katvāna tidivaṃ gato.
anya-e1211n:682: Sabbasmiṃ puññakammeca sadā ramati me mano;
anya-e1211n:706: Pubbā yā kāci kaññā bahuṃ puññaṃ akarī
anya-e1211n:707: Pubbā yā kāci kaññāyo bahuṃ puññaṃ akaruṃ
anya-e1211n:708: Bho pubbe kaññe bahuṃ puññaṃ akaro
anya-e1211n:709: Bho pubbā kaññāyo bahuṃ puññaṃ akarittha
anya-e1211n:710: Pubbaṃ yaṃ kiṃci kaññaṃ puññaṃ kārāpayī
anya-e1211n:711: Pubbā yā kāci kaññāyo puññe kārāpayī
anya-e1211n:712: Pubbāya yāya kāyaci kaññāya puññaṃ kataṃ
anya-e1211n:713: Pubbāhi yāhi kāhici kaññāhi puññāni katāni
anya-e1211n:714: Pubbāya yāya kāyaci kaññāya koci anucarī
anya-e1211n:715: Pubbāhi yāhi kāhici kaññāhi keci anucariṃsu
anya-e1211n:716: Pubbāya yāya kāyaci kaññāya ābharaṇaṃ adadī
anya-e1211n:718: Pubbāya yāya kāyaci kaññāya koci puriso apeto.
anya-e1211n:719: Pubbāhi yāya kāhici kaññāhi keci purisā apetā
anya-e1211n:720: Pubbāya yāya kāyaci kaññāya mātāpitaro ahesuṃ
anya-e1211n:722: Pubbāyaṃ yāya kāyaci kaññāyaṃ cittaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e1211n:723: Pubbāsu yāsu kāsuci kaññāsu cittaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ.
anya-e1211n:726: Pubbaṃ yaṃ kiṃci pana bahuṃ puccaṃ akarī
anya-e1211n:727: Pubbāni yāni kānici bahuṃ puññaṃ akaruṃ
anya-e1211n:728: Bho pubba bhūta tvaṃ bahuṃ puññaṃ akaro
anya-e1211n:729: Bho pubbāni bhūtāni bahuṃ puññaṃ akarittha
anya-e1211n:730: Pubbaṃ yaṃ kiṃci puññaṃ kārāpayī ekacco
anya-e1211n:731: Pubbāni yāni kānici puññe kārāpayiṃsu ekacce
anya-e1211n:758: Ekassa garuno kho pana parikkhāro hoti
anya-e1211n:759: Ekesaṃ garūnaṃ kho pana guṇaghoso hoti
anya-e1211n:764: Ekā kaññā pana devadattaṃ kambalaṃ yācate
anya-e1211n:782: Ekaṃ kulaṃ pana bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati
anya-e1211n:800: Yo koci taṃ purisaṃ odanaṃ pācāpeti
anya-e1211n:801: Ye keci taṃ purisaṃ odanaṃ pācāpenti
anya-e1211n:802: Yaṃ kiṃci dāsaṃ gāmaṃ gamayati sāmiko
anya-e1211n:803: Ye keci dāse gāmaṃ gamayati sāmiko
anya-e1211n:808: Yassa kassaci dānaṃ deti saddho sappuriso
anya-e1211n:818: Yā kāci vanitā pana dāsiṃ kammaṃ kārāpeti
anya-e1211n:819: Yā kāci vanitāyo dāsī kamme kārāpenti
anya-e1211n:820: Yaṃ kiṃci vanitaṃ puññaṃ kārāpeti puriso
anya-e1211n:821: Yā kāci vanitāyo puññaṃ kārenti purisā
anya-e1211n:822: Yāya kāyaci vanitāya sāmi bhattaṃ bhojāpīyate
anya-e1211n:823: Yāhi kāhici vanitāhi sāmi bhattaṃ bhojāpito
anya-e1211n:824: Yāya kāyaci vanitāya sukhaṃ pāpuṇāti sāmiko
anya-e1211n:825: Yāhi kāhici vanitāhi sukhaṃ pāpuṇanti sāmikā
anya-e1211n:826: Yāya kāyaci vanitāya ābharaṇaṃ deti sāmiko
anya-e1211n:827: Yāsaṃ kāsaṃci vanitānaṃ ābharaṇaṃ deti sāmiko
anya-e1211n:828: Yāya kāyaci vanitāya apeti yo koci
anya-e1211n:829: Yāhi kāhici vanitāhi apeti yo koci
anya-e1211n:832: Yāyaṃ kāyaṃci vanitāyaṃ me cittaṃ na ramati
anya-e1211n:833: Yāsu kāsuci vanitāsu me cittāni na ramanti.
anya-e1211n:836: Yaṃ kiṃci kulaṃ pana bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati
anya-e1211n:837: Yāni kānici kulāni bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavanti
anya-e1211n:838: Yaṃ kiṃci bahuṃ puññaṃ kārāpeti koci
anya-e1211n:839: Yāni kānici bahuṃ puññaṃ kārenti keci
anya-e1211n:869: Tesu bhikkhūsu pana me mano ramati.
anya-e1211n:872: Sā khattiyakaññā pana bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati
anya-e1211n:886: Tāyaṃ khattiya kaññāyaṃ pasīdati yo koci
anya-e1211n:890: Taṃ kulaṃ niccaṃ bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati
anya-e1211n:891: Tāni kulāni pana bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavanti
anya-e1211n:892: Taṃ kulaṃ uddissa puññaṃ karoti koci
anya-e1211n:893: Tāni kulāni uddissa puññāni karonti keci
anya-e1211n:908: Eso sisso ca garuṃ dhammaṃ pucchati
anya-e1211n:909: Ete sissā ca garuṃ dhammaṃ pucchanti
anya-e1211n:926: Esā vanitā pana dāsiṃ kammaṃ kārāpeti.
anya-e1211n:936: Etāya vanitāya pana yo koci apeti
anya-e1211n:937: Etāhi vanitāhi pana ye keci apenti
anya-e1211n:944: Etaṃ kulaṃ pana bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati
anya-e1211n:946: Etaṃ kulaṃ pana passati yo koci
anya-e1211n:947: Etāni kulāni pana passanti ye keci
anya-e1211n:950: Etena kulena pana jano sukhaṃ pāpuṇāti
anya-e1211n:951: Etehi kulehi pana janā sukhaṃ pāpuṇanti
anya-e1211n:952: Etassa kulassa kho pana dhanaṃ dadāti dhanavā
anya-e1211n:953: Etesaṃ kulānaṃ pana dhanaṃ dadanti dhanavantā
anya-e1211n:954: Etasmā kulamhā kho pana ekacco na apeti
anya-e1211n:955: Etehi kulehi kho pana ekacce na apenti
anya-e1211n:958: Etasmiṃ kulamhi pana me mano ramati
anya-e1211n:959: Etesu kulesu me manāni na ramanti.
anya-e1211n:962: Ayaṃ jano pana taṃ purisaṃ puññaṃ kārāpeti
anya-e1211n:963: Ime janā te purise puññaṃ kārāpenti
anya-e1211n:980: Ayaṃ kaññā pana bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati
anya-e1211n:990: Imāya kaññāya pana apeti yo koci
anya-e1211n:991: Imāhi kaññāhi pana apeti yo koci
anya-e1211n:998: Imaṃ cittaṃ pana attano santānaṃ vijānāti
anya-e1211n:1006: Imassa cittassa ovādaṃ deti yo koci
anya-e1211n:1007: Imesaṃ cittānaṃ ovādaṃ denti ye keci
anya-e1211n:1016: Asu mahārājā catuhi saṅgahavatthūhi janaṃ toseti
anya-e1211n:1022: Amunā mahārājena kho pana mahājano sucarati
anya-e1211n:1023: Amūhi mahārājehi kho pana mahājano sucarati
anya-e1211n:1030: Amusmiṃ mahārāje kho pana mahājano pasīdati
anya-e1211n:1031: Amūsu mahārājesu kho pana mahājanā pasīdanti.
anya-e1211n:1034: Asu upāsikā pana sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ suṇāti
anya-e1211n:1040: Amuyā upāsikāya yo koci pana sucarati
anya-e1211n:1041: Amūhi upāsikāhi ye keci pana sucaranti
anya-e1211n:1045: Amūhi upāsikāhi ye keci pana apenti
anya-e1211n:1049: Amūsu upāsikāsu pana ye keci pasīdanti.
anya-e1211n:1052: Aduṃ dhanavaṃ niccaṃ bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati
anya-e1211n:1070: Kohi nāma budho loke vasaṃ kodhassa gacchati;
anya-e1211n:1071: Ke hitvā mānusaṃ dehaṃ dibbaṃ yogaṃ upaccaguṃ.
anya-e1211n:1072: Kaṃsi tvaṃ assu uddissa pabbajito ca āvuso;
anya-e1211n:1073: Keci puññāni katvāna kittakā tidivaṃ gatā.
anya-e1211n:1074: Kenāyaṃ pakato satto kuvaṃ sattassa kārako;
anya-e1211n:1075: Kehidaṃ pakataṃ bimbaṃ kvannu bibbassa kārako.
anya-e1211n:1076: Kena te tādiso vaṇṇo kena te idha mijjhati;
anya-e1211n:1077: Kehi me puññakammehi mamaṃ rakkhanti devatā.
anya-e1211n:1079: Kesaṃ divāca rattoca sadā puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati.
anya-e1211n:1081: Kehi nāma ariyehi puthageva jano ayaṃ.
anya-e1211n:1082: Kassa tvaṃ dhammamaññāya vācaṃ bhasayi īdisaṃ;
anya-e1211n:1084: Kamhi kāle tayā vīra patthitā bodhimuttamā;
anya-e1211n:1088: Kā ca suphassayaṃ dānaṃ mañcapīṭhādikaṃ adā;
anya-e1211n:1089: Kāyo nānāvidhaṃ puññaṃ katvāna tidivaṃ gatā.
anya-e1211n:1090: Kaṃ bhāvanañca bhāveti kaṃ sīlaṃ paripālayī;
anya-e1211n:1091: Kā nāma dāsiyo kamme kārāpayati sāmiko.
anya-e1211n:1092: Kāya upāsikāyassu dhammo ca sūyate sadā;
anya-e1211n:1093: Kāhi ca sīlavatīhi dhammo ca sūyate sadā.
anya-e1211n:1094: Kāya vijjāya me putto pāpuṇāti idaṃ sukhaṃ;
anya-e1211n:1095: Kāhi sikkhāhi me puttā pāpuṇanti idaṃ sukhaṃ.
anya-e1211n:1099: Kāhi ca pana nadīhi pabhavanti mahānadī.
anya-e1211n:1100: Kassā kho pana gaṅgāya mahogho hoti sabbadā;
anya-e1211n:1101: Kāsaṃ kho pana kaññānaṃ ābharaṇā bhavanti ca.
anya-e1211n:1102: Kassaṃ nadiṃ pana macchā niccaṃ vicaranti sadā;
anya-e1211n:1103: Kāsu gaṅgāsu kho macchā niccaṃ vicaranti sadā.
anya-e1211n:1106: Kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedha kiṃ te ajinasāṭiyā;
anya-e1211n:1107: Kāni cittāni jāyanti kathaṃ jānema taṃ mayaṃ.
anya-e1211n:1108: Kiṃ tvaṃ attavasaṃ disvā mama dajjāsimaṃ dhanaṃ;
anya-e1211n:1109: Kāni puññāni katvāna kittakā tidivaṃ gatā.
anya-e1211n:1112: Kenāsi dummano tāta purisaṃ kannu yocasi;
anya-e1211n:1113: Kehi pupphehi sakkaccaṃ saddho yajati gotamaṃ.
anya-e1211n:1114: Kassa so kayirā mettiṃ tamāhu cariyaṃ budhā;
anya-e1211n:1116: Kasmā coro ahu me tvaṃ iti rājā apucchitaṃ;
anya-e1211n:1117: Kehi nāmapi hetūhi jāyantīti ime janā.
anya-e1211n:1120: Kasmiṃ me sivayo kuddhā nāhaṃ passāmi dukkaṭaṃ;
anya-e1211n:1121: Kesu puññesu yojeti sakhīnaṃ so sakhāhitoti.
anya-e1211n:1170: Tayā cittamhā kho pana bhayaṃ uppajjati
anya-e1211n:1174: Tayi citte kho pana kusalacittaṃ patiṭhitaṃ
anya-e1211n:1244: Vo no te meti rūpāni padāni padato yato;
anya-e1211n:1245: Tato nāmikapantīsu natū vuttāni tāni me.
anya-e1211n:1247: Sāmissa vacane ceva vo no saddo pavattati.
anya-e1211n:1248: Karaṇe sampadāne ca sāmiatthe ca āgato;
anya-e1211n:1249: Te me saddoti viññeyyo viññunā nayadassināti.
anya-e1211n:1612: Dasassa gaṇanassa dasaguṇitaṃ katvā sataṃ hoti.
anya-e1211n:1615: Taṃ lakkhanti vuccati, satasahassassa dasaguṇitaṃ katvā dasasatasahassaṃ hoti.
anya-e1211n:1629: Nava nāgasahassāni nāge nāge sataṃ rathā
anya-e1211n:1630: Rathe rathe sataṃ assā asse asse sataṃ narā
anya-e1211n:1631: Nare nare sataṃ kaññā eke kissaṃ satitthiyo
anya-e1211n:1637: Kamo kaccāyane eso pāliyā so virujjhati
